name: meatspac-minus-meatspac
description: bookmarklet for achieving a "garfield minus garfield"-like experience in the meatspac.

scripts.build: browserify -t brfs -t uglifyify index.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/dist.js && node ./build-page.js

author: Travis Collins <travis@tec27.com> (http://tec27.com/)
